name: Women & Gender Studies
descriptions: The Women & Gender Studies minor provides interdisciplinary exploration of gender, sexuality, and feminist thought. Students complete two required courses and four electives from an approved list.

No more than 2 courses from any single discipline (excluding WGST prefix courses) and no more than 2 courses from another institution may count toward the minor. Note: Beginning after June 1, 2026, the Department of Women & Gender Studies will merge into the English department. Faculty, majors, minors, and courses will continue under that umbrella.

electiveCourses.description: Four additional courses from an approved list. No more than 2 courses from any single discipline (excluding WGST prefix courses).
